channel.title: *Recruiting Adventure Scape Staff!*
channel.description:
*********************Server Recruiting************************** Hello, I am currently the Adventure Scape Owner and founder. Before I put up any information on the site or game I need staff. I am recruiting and if I see to many abuses i will remove this topic. Thanks and all the information you need is below. ********************************************************************************* Positions Available:
Forums Mod (2)- What a Forums mod does is keep controll of the Adventure Scape Forums. They try their best to help the people who are in need.
Server Mod (2)- What a server mod is is a person who keeps controll of the game. This includes reporting all bad players and muting the people who deserve it.
Server Admin (0)- At this moment in time i dont need admins because the server is not open yet to players.
Coder (1)- I am an experienced coder but i cant do the whole thing by myself. This is granted to a deserving person.
Fill this out and reply:
[code] E-mail: Name: Experience: Proof: What are you applying for: Other Info: [/code]
Proof and experience are needed most.
Requirements:
As Forums Mod you must be dedicated and active on the site. You must obey all rules. You must have had prior experience.
Server Mod must be active and when and admin is not around you must take initative to look around for rule breakers.
Coder must have really good experience with java, html, and css, also must be able to design logos.
********************************************************************************* Staff ********************************************************************************* Owner: Ham8legs
Server Mods: None yet
Forum Mods None yet
Forum/Server Coder: None yet ***************************************** Thank You, Ham8legs :cool:

item.title: *Recruiting Adventure Scape Staff!*
item.dc:creator: @ham8legs ham8legs
item.description:
@ham8legs wrote:

Server Recruiting*****
Hello,
I am currently the Adventure Scape Owner and founder. Before I put up any information on the site or game I need staff. I am recruiting and if I see to many abuses i will remove this topic. Thanks and all the information you need is below.

Positions Available:

Forums Mod (2)- What a Forums mod does is keep controll of the Adventure Scape Forums. They try their best to help the people who are in need.

Server Mod (2)- What a server mod is is a person who keeps controll of the game. This includes reporting all bad players and muting the people who deserve it.

Server Admin (0)- At this moment in time i dont need admins because the server is not open yet to players.

Coder (1)- I am an experienced coder but i cant do the whole thing by myself. This is granted to a deserving person.

Fill this out and reply:

E-mail:
Name:
Experience:
Proof:
What are you applying for:
Other Info:

Proof and experience are needed most.

Requirements:

As Forums Mod you must be dedicated and active on the site. You must obey all rules. You must have had prior experience.

Server Mod must be active and when and admin is not around you must take initative to look around for rule breakers.

Coder must have really good experience with java, html, and css, also must be able to design logos.

                                                                   Staff

Owner:
Ham8legs

Server Mods:
None yet

Forum Mods
None yet

None yet

Thank You,
Ham8legs
